Korrilla.synopsis: This is a fallback one-liner. In case the Player manages to approach her an initiate dialog in TWN, Korrilla gives a cryptic one-liner to the player. No Hasmet node is needed, as she teleports away right after.She would be struggling with the shadow curse as she says this line.
Korrilla.how_to_trigger: Open ReCon and use "statusapply INVISIBILITY", and also "god" to protect you from the shadowcurse.Go to -111; 24; -29 in SCL_Main_A which teleports Korrilla to-108; 24; -19.  Approach Korrilla and initiate dialog. If you are not invisible, she should teleport away if she sees you approach.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The input only includes one session, 'Korrilla'. Since there is only one session, there are no ordering constraints (neither predecessor nor successor relationships) or mutual exclusiveness constraints that can be determined from the available data.

Korrilla_0.speaker: Korrilla
Korrilla_0.text: Tr-tread carefully. You are still... necessary.
Korrilla_0.context: NodeContext: the ellipses and hyphens here are to denote her struggling to get the words out as she's afflicted with shadowcurse
